name: SparksofGratitude
0:
”Alexa, open sparks of gratitude”
”Alexa, start sparks of gratitude”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sparks of gratitude
des:
Grab some gratitude - it's the spark that ignites change! 
A daily gratitude quote will keep your mindset right.
When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
